title: How am I supposed to get access to the PBE?
body:
Title.

I got an email just yesterday saying I got access to the Alpha Client, which I haven't signed up for. Thing is though, I thought it was the PBE and I was really excited. I've looked up how to get access but I can't find anything, nor can I find anything on if the PBE is actually integrated into the Alpha Client. Help me

replies.body:
Alpha Client access and PBE access are two different systems. The alpha client is the entirely new client that is in testing that will tie to your actual account. The PBE system is an entirely separate server that receives balance and some content releases for testing before they hit the live servers. If you haven't applied for PBE access yet, you can do so [here.](https://pbesignup.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)

Let me know if you have any additional questions.

Whenever I click on that link and then try to sign up for it, it sends me to an error page. I have no problems with the link itself, and the alpha client was fine. How do I sign up without it sending me to the error page where I can do nothing?

EDIT: Did nothing, somehow fixed itself
I know you have to download/patch a whole different thing (the alpha client), but I don't know where that's supposed to be found.
